channel.title: Source Coding
channel.description: so ive looked for a tutorial on how to cod server, does anybody have a really good tutorial. like start to finish. with a good base server too. or like anybody know an excellent source, if so post a link please. THANKS IN ADVANCE

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

ok jmood, so for hyperion base. i need to make my own compiler right? and also i need to make a rune server too? just wondering

Read full topic

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you want to learn how to code go to: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/, I should also suggest you either use Czar, or Hyperion, I would suggest Hyperion when you learn more of the 317 protocol and Java it’s self.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @kool_dude567 kool dude567
item.description:
@kool_dude567 wrote:

When have i asked to change an interface icon?? And yes, im sorry i dont know the total advanced coding for the skill of MINING. Oh no, please, how can i bare it…? seriously try NOT to start a fight on some other guy’s thread that isn’t even about this.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

kool dude567:

Why what? Why do i have low post count and rep? Well, just because i dont POST that much, or have a high rep, does not mean that my answers will be stupid and pointless? I read a lot of the posts that are written, and like i said, if you read my post, I’m an on and off coder, like i sometimes stop for a year and then start again. But by no means does that make me a bad one? Hope that answers your question for you.

Great coder my assO_o
You’ve asked for ALOT of help on easy things like mining, or chaning a interface icon.

Read full topic

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“kool dude567, post:5, topic:339614”]Agreed. You legit looked for like 10 minutes dude. I’ve been coding for years now (on and off) and I started without any tutorials. Go download a base, experiment with things, look around the files, and figure things out. If that’s not what you like to do, then maybe this just isnt for you? No offence - just constructive criticism[/quote]low post count, low rep, registered in 2006, GOD.

WHAII.

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @kool_dude567 kool dude567
item.description:
@kool_dude567 wrote:

Agreed. You legit looked for like 10 minutes dude. I’ve been coding for years now (on and off) and I started without any tutorials. Go download a base, experiment with things, look around the files, and figure things out. If that’s not what you like to do, then maybe this just isnt for you? No offence - just constructive criticism

Read full topic

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

thunderflea:

ok, well ive looked in both sections for a source and a tut, ive found neither that works for me. all of the source have bugs that make them not work. if u know one that does work well please post it. i havent found any tutorials on just starting the source coding of a server. but i wouldn’t mind editing a premade source, so if u have a good base, or a good source. please feel free to post it. also please post any tutorial for server editing. like making a minigame for instane.

Tutorials - If you don’t want to learn 2 read, then learn your self.
Sources - NONE of them is not going to have 0 bugs/glitches. . .
Also their will always be stuff you want that it does not have, this is why you pick the one with the hardest thing to put in your server/client, and code the others. Or just pick something that looks fun.(To me I like coding.)

Read full topic

item.title: Source Coding
item.dc:creator: @kool_dude567 kool dude567
item.description:
@kool_dude567 wrote:

Well, you could go to the server downloads page for a good base. Just look through them and pick whichever one you want. And as for your tutorials, go to the tutorials section of this forum and take a look around there. I don’t know about WHOLE tutorials for EVERYTHING ABOUT CODING, but there are little snippets of stuff. And besides, if you pick a good source, I doubt you’ll need to completely recode your server. Good Luck!

Read full topic
